overview: Metallica at Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil on September 19, 2015. Setlist: Fuel / For Whom the Bell Tolls / Battery / King Nothing / Ride the Lightning (followed by Kirk's guitar doodle) / The Unforgiven / Cyanide / Wherever I May Roam / Sad But True (followed by Trujillo's bass doodle) / Turn the Page (Bob Seger cover) / The Frayed Ends of Sanity / One / Master of Puppets (followed by Kirk's guitar solo) / Fade to Black / Seek & Destroy / Whiskey in the Jar / Nothing Else Matters / Enter Sandman
title: Metallica: Rock in Rio 2015
